name: UpdateBatchWebhook
description:
Update a batch webhook on Mailchimp.

Use this tool to update a webhook that triggers when a batch request in Mailchimp completes. This is useful for managing notifications and automated responses to batch operations.

parameters.name: batch_webhook_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the batch webhook to update.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the batch webhook.

parameters.name: webhook_url
parameters.description: A valid URL to send webhook notifications when a batch request completes in Mailchimp.

value_schema.description: A valid URL for the Webhook.

parameters.name: enable_webhook
parameters.description: Enable or disable webhook requests (true for enable, false for disable).

value_schema.description: Whether the webhook receives requests or not.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: batch_webhook_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the batch webhook.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the batch webhook.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A valid URL for the Webhook.

value_schema.description: A valid URL for the Webhook.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the webhook receives requests or not.

value_schema.description: Whether the webhook receives requests or not.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
